history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_zero_l,zero,scal. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_zero_l,zero,scal_distr_r,scal. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_opp_r,zero,scal_distr_r,scal,plus_zero_l. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_opp_r,zero,scal_distr_l,scal_distr_r,scal,plus_zero_l. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_opp_r,zero,scal_distr_l,plus_zero_r,scal_distr_r,scal,plus_zero_l. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_opp_r,plus_opp_l,zero,scal_distr_l,plus_zero_r,scal_distr_r,scal,plus_zero_l.

exceptions.exn: In environment x : R -> R -> Prop The term "x" has type "R -> R -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "Ring.sort ?K".
In environment x : R -> R -> Prop The term "x" has type "R -> R -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "Ring.sort ?K0".
The LHS of plus_opp_r (plus _ (opp _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

exceptions.tactic: apply plus_reg_r with (r := scal x zero).
exceptions.exn: The reference x was not found in the current environment.
The reference x was not found in the current environment.

The LHS of plus_opp_l (plus (opp _) _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment X0 : ?K0 -> ?V0 -> ?V0 H0 : forall (x y : ?K1) (u : ?V1), scal (plus x y) u = plus (scal x u) (scal y u) X : ?G0 H : forall x : ?G1, plus zero x = x H1 : R -> Prop H4 : forall x : ?G4, plus zero x = x X2 : ?K3 -> ?V3 -> ?V3 H3 : forall (x y : ?K2) (u : ?V2), scal (plus x y) u = plus (scal x u) (scal y u) X1 : ?G3 H2 : forall x : ?G2, plus x (opp x) = zero H8 : forall x : ?G7, plus zero x = x X4 : ?K6 -> ?V6 -> ?V6 H7 : forall (x y : ?K5) (u : ?V5), scal (plus x y) u = plus (scal x u) (scal y u) H6 : forall (x : ?K4) (u v : ?V4), scal x (plus u v) = plus (scal x u) (scal x v) X3 : ?G6 H5 : forall x : ?G5, plus x (opp x) = zero H13 : forall x : ?G11, plus zero x = x X6 : ?K9 -> ?V9 -> ?V9 H12 : forall (x y : ?K8) (u : ?V8), scal (plus x y) u = plus (scal x u) (scal y u) H11 : forall x : ?G10, plus x zero = x H10 : forall (x : ?K7) (u v : ?V7), scal x (plus u v) = plus (scal x u) (scal x v) X5 : ?G9 H9 : forall x : ?G8, plus x (opp x) = zero H19 : forall x : ?G16, plus zero x = x X8 : ?K12 -> ?V12 -> ?V12 H18 : forall (x y : ?K11) (u : ?V11), scal (plus x y) u = plus (scal x u) (scal y u) H17 : forall x : ?G15, plus x zero = x H16 : forall (x : ?K10) (u v : ?V10), scal x (plus u v) = plus (scal x u) (scal x v) X7 : ?G14 H15 : forall x : ?G13, plus (opp x) x = zero H14 : forall x : ?G12, plus x (opp x) = zero Unable to unify "plus zero ?M11376 = ?M11376" with "AbelianGroup".

original: intros x. rewrite <- (plus_zero_l (scal x zero)). rewrite <- (scal_distr_r x x zero). rewrite plus_opp_r. apply plus_reg_r with (r := scal x zero). rewrite (plus_comm (scal x zero) zero). rewrite <- scal_distr_l. rewrite plus_zero_r. rewrite plus_opp_l. apply plus_zero_l.
